Sentencas: This paper presents a high-performance interconnect ceramic for solid oxide fuel cells (SOM), based on a modification of La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-delta (LCC).
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: It was found that addition of a small amount of YDC (Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9) into LCC dramatically increased the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: For the best system, LCC + 3 wt.% YDC, the electrical conductivity reached 104.8 S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the specimen with 2 wt.% YDC in H-2 at 800 degrees C was 5.9 S cm(-1).
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: With the increase of YDC content, the relative density increased, reaching 97.6% when the YDC content was 10 wt.%.
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: The average coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) at 30-1000 degrees C in air increased with YDC content, ranging from 11. 12 x 10(-6) K-1 to 15.34 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: The oxygen permeation measurement illustrated a negligible oxygen ionic conduction, indicating that it is still an electronically conducting ceramic.
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs

Sentencas: Therefore, it is a very promising interconnecting ceramic for SOFCs.
Titulo: Electrical properties, sintering and thermal expansion behavior of composite ceramic interconnecting materials, La0.7Ca0.3CrO3-δ/Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 for SOFCs
